wikipedia_page.main: Mary Stoddard (c.1852 – 10 June 1901), was a Scottish-born artist who spent twenty years in Australia and was known for her still life paintings, miniatures and full-size portraits, including two of Sir Henry Parkes.

response: *Mary Stoddard (1852–1901), Scottish-born artist who spent twenty years in Australia
